channel.title: Sledgin?
channel.description:
Any of u been sledgin?
I went with a load of friends. We started at the top of the hill (as u do) and my friend Jonte pushes me and goes by a bit. I wasn't havin any of that so i jumped from my sledge onto his and we nearly crashed into a barbed wire fence at the bottom. Scary times :|
Post ur stories!

item.title: Sledgin?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:20, topic:321535”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=417983.msg3073095#msg3073095 date=1261639163]

Sledding. Not sledgin

I used to when I was a little kid. Snowboarding down mountains is more fun though.

Sledging is a word… Just another term for sledding.
[/quote]

Yeah, if you are playing cricket…[/quote]

Sledging can mean:

* Sledding The activity
* Sledging (cricket) Verbal abuse or comments meant to intimidate or put off an opposing batsman in cricket.
* Sledging (bodyboarding)
  • Wikipedia.

Read full topic

77 Runescape 2 Server Emulation / Server Help / Re: shops tut! on: December 20, 2009, 06:38:51 pm Search through this shit!

Moparscape has has TONS of these kinds of tuts.
Since i’m bored, I’ll help you.

What kind of server? 317 508… etc…

[quote=“licorish55, post:21, topic:319484”]Deathspirit…
Honestly, you couldn’t just let this post get burried.
Noooo had to bring it back.[/quote]

132 Runescape 2 Server Emulation / Server Downloads / Re: ~~~TONY-SCAPE V1 CUSTOM NPCS, CUSTOM WEAPONS/ARMORS!~~~ on: December 17, 2009, 06:39:28 pm Dude. are you serious? Why the FUCK would i have a Trojan on my computer. Let alone how the hell would I know how to put one in.

Your pissed because you know its a Trojan.

142 Runescape 2 Server Emulation / Server Downloads / Re: ~~~TONY-SCAPE V1 CUSTOM NPCS, CUSTOM WEAPONS/ARMORS!~~~ on: December 17, 2009, 06:11:46 am learn to program ? LMFAO.

Adding NPC’s and Objects and the bullshit he added…
Takes like 15 mins.

And maybe a little bit of time for the customs.
But other than that,

Fuck of Luke.

[quote=“licorish55, post:20, topic:319678”]There is either a ‘nonWild()’ method or ‘isInWilderness()’ method located in the client class.
Put the Coords between those perenthesies. <(How ever you spell that lol)
I think that should work…[/quote]
I’m done with you. It’d be worthless trying to show you how much of a fool you’re making yourself look like. Plus, this counts as spam. I don’t really care if I get any dots on this site because their pointless; but, I’d rather keep the little respect that I do have.
